org.openlcb.cdi.impl

Class ConfigRepresentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.DefaultPropertyListenerSupport
      • org.openlcb.cdi.impl.ConfigRepresentation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyListenerSupport

    public class ConfigRepresentation
extends DefaultPropertyListenerSupport
    Maintains a parsed cache of the CDI config of a remote node. Responsible for fetching the CDI, parsing the XML, identifying all variables with their correct offsets and creating useful internal representations of these variables. Performs reads and writes to the configuration space. Created by bracz on 3/29/16.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ConfigRepresentation.CdiContainer
      Interface for all internal representation of nodes that have children.
      class  ConfigRepresentation.CdiEntry
      Base class for all internal representations of the nodes (both variables as well as groups and segments).
      class  ConfigRepresentation.EventEntry
      Represents an event variable.
      class  ConfigRepresentation.GroupBase
      Base class for both repeated and non-repeated groups.
      class  ConfigRepresentation.GroupEntry
      Represents the root entry of a group.
      class  ConfigRepresentation.GroupRep
      Represents one repeat of a repeated group.
      class  ConfigRepresentation.IntegerEntry
      Represents an integer variable.
      class  ConfigRepresentation.Root 
      class  ConfigRepresentation.SegmentEntry
      Represents a Segment that looks like a group as well as an Entry to allow common handling of groups and segments.
      class  ConfigRepresentation.StringEntry
      Represents a string variable.
      static class  ConfigRepresentation.Visitor
      Interface for traversing the tree of settings.
